thread.title: Winslet's Special Bond With her Children
thread.title_full: Winslet's Special Bond With her Children

title: Winslet's Special Bond With her Children
text:
Kate Winslet(AP) 
LOS ANGELES: Actress Kate Winslet says she shares a special bond with her three children. 
The "Steve Jobs" actress, who has daughter Mia, 15, and sons Joe, 11, and Bear, 22 months, from three different marriages, admits she wouldn't be able to juggle motherhood without the help of her eldest child, reports femalefirst.co.uk. 
She said: "My 15-year-old, she's so wonderful. She helps, and not only that but I see sides of me now coming out in her. She is incredibly helpful to me as a woman and as a parent. 
"I'll say to her, 'Mims, can you please have Bear for the next hour? I'm just gonna grab a shower and I've got a couple of things I've got to do.' She's like, 'Yep, sure!' 
"Children should play with each other, you know? And look after each other. That's really what we have, and it's very special."
